items.title: Heinrich-Heine-Schule Büdelsdorf
text: Expecting to graduate with A-Levels in 2020.
Focus on social science. Chose music and advanced French classes.

items.title: Freie Waldorfschule Rendsburg
text: Left without a degree due to the school's insolvency.
Former member of the elected state-wide and the local student's council and helped with projects such as <q>Schüler helfen Schüler</q> (help for refugees).

items.title: Student exchange to France
text: Three-month long, mutual student exchange to Nantes, capital of the French region <q>Pays de la Loire</q>.
Visited the <q>Lycée Nelson Mandela</q> for the time, thus having all my classes in French (Première S, focus on natural sciences).

items.title: Web development and design
text: Helped realize several projects and complete tasks as a Virtual Assistant. Design and development of websites based on client guidelines.
Amongst my projects are small e-commerce websites as well as complex livestreaming systems. Mostly English-speaking contacts.

items.title: Internship at HanseWerk AG (formerly E.ON Hanse)
text: Two-week long internship where I got to take a look at all of the company's branches, special focus on software and electrical engineering.

items.title: Internship with landscape architect Dipl.-Ing. Johannes Kahl
text: Two-week long internship with a focus on design and creativity. Used Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Inkscape, pencils and markers a lot.

items.title: General
text: Calm, skilled in (professional) professional social interactions, willing to compromise, relatively extroverted

items.title: English ~ C2 ~ 10 years
text: Lessons in school since first grade as well as use of anglophone resources for learning, use in professional context.

items.title: French ~ B2 - C1 ~ 9 years
text: Lessons in school as well as student exchange and several other trips to France. Good knowledge in written and spoken word. Easy, fluent expression in daily use of the language.

items.title: Programming
items: HTML (Jade, HAML, Liquid, etc.), CSS (Sass), JavaScript (jQuery, CoffeeScript, React, Angular, Vue.js, ECMAScript 6).
Ruby (on Rails), Java (Eclipse, Android), PHP (Symfony, Wordpress), Python.
Knowledge and experience with Apache, Nginx, Wowza, Nimble, Linux, Windows, SQL (MySQL, Postgres, NoSQL, etc).

items.title: Programs
items: Graphical editing: Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, Gimp.
LibreOffice Suite (skills are mostly applicable to Microsoft Office).

items.title: Other interests
text: Sports - former team captain of local American football team, participated in the all-star competition of Schleswig-Holstein in 2015; weightlifting.
Music – electrical guitar, ukulele, electrical bass; in several bands with occasional gigs.
